original: 劉備部屬。劉備與劉璋反目後，遣黃忠、卓膺為先鋒攻打劉璋。之後正史再無提及卓膺。《演義》中原為劉璋屬下，在雒城投降劉備，之後同正史所載。
text: Liu Bei's subordinate. After Liu Bei and Liu Zhang turned against each other, Huang Zhong and Zhuo Ying were the vanguards to attack Liu Zhang. After that, the official history did not mention Zhuo Yin. "The Romance" was originally written by Liu Zhang's subordinate, who surrendered Liu Bei in Luocheng.
